content:
{"name": "Self-Service DTA Kiosk at the Brockton Old Colony YMCA (limited services available)", "alternate_name": "", "description": "**Parking**
* There is limited parking including street, metered, and a small parking lot requiring a parking pass.

**Services**
* There is an official Department of Transitional Assistance Kiosk at this location with access to the DTA Connect mobile application and website. [Learn what you can do through DTA Connect.](https://www.mass.gov/guides/how-to-contact-dta)


***NOTE:*** These locations are not staffed by DTA employees.", "email": "", "url": "https://www.mass.gov/locations/self-service-dta-kiosk-at-the-brockton-old-colony-ymca-limited-services-available", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "320 Main Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Downtown", "state_province": "MA", "postal_code": "02301", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 42.0788109, "longitude": -71.0195073}, "phones": [{"number": "(877) 382-2363", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Sunday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "09:30", "closes_at": "01:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "09:30", "closes_at": "01:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "09:30", "closes_at": "01:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "09:30", "closes_at": "01:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "09:30", "closes_at": "01:00"}]}
